code: import React,{useState}from'react';import Input from'@mui/joy/Input';import List from'@mui/joy/List';import ListItem from'@mui/joy/ListItem';import{IconButton,Sheet}from'@mui/joy';import PlayerLine from'./PlayerLine';import FormHelperText from'@mui/joy/FormHelperText';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function PlayerBalance(_ref){let{playersData,setPlayersData}=_ref;const addPlayer=()=>{setPlayersData(prev=>[...prev,{name:'',start_balance:'',end_balance:''}]);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Sheet,{color:"primary",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(List,{children:playersData.map((player,i)=>{return i===playersData.length-1?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ListItem,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PlayerLine,{playerData:player,setPlayerData:setPlayersData,index:i}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconButton,{variant:"soft",color:"primary",onClick:()=>addPlayer(),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ion-icon",{name:"add-outline"})})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItem,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PlayerLine,{playerData:player,setPlayerData:setPlayersData,index:i})});})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FormHelperText,{id:"my-helper-text",children:"Leave the end balance blank if it is 0."})]});}
